questions.question: In which of the Free Cities was Robb Stark’s wife, Talisa Maegyr, raised?
questions.reveal: Talisa Maegyr was raised in Volantis. Inspired by a slave who saved her little brother from drowning, Talisa vowed never to live in a slave city again, and relocated to Westeros.

questions.question: Which of the following kingdoms did the Andals fail to conquer during their invasion of Westeros?
questions.reveal: The Andals did not conquer The North. A number of Andal armies were thrown back by the Crannogmen of the Neck, Meera and Jojen Reed’s ancestors.

questions.question: Who gives Tyrion his facial scar during the Battle of the Blackwater?
questions.reveal: Mandon Moore gave Tyrion his facial scar. It’s implied in series 3 that Joffrey ordered Mandon Moore, a member of the Kingsguard, to kill Tyrion on the battlefield
